definition: sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: Luo city have door and the high-rise.
sentences.chinese: 例句與用法羅城的四面修有城門，上起高樓。

sentences.english: Presto, sample sentences and usage examples.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼間，就能看到例句和用法示例。

sentences.english: I have been using Kingsoft Antivirus since I bought my computer.
sentences.chinese: 例句自從我買了電腦，我就開始使用金山毒霸。

sentences.english: The Club looks a little like a three-leaf clover design.
sentences.chinese: 例句梅花看上去有點像三葉草的圖案。

sentences.english: The dictionary is blemished by those long ineffective example sentences.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典差就差在收錄那些過於冗長不當的例句。

sentences.english: But, again, no example sentences are provided.
sentences.chinese: 不過，同樣沒有提供例句。

sentences.english: We have four minor vacations every year.
sentences.chinese: 例句我們每年有四個小長假。

sentences.english: I like playing the online games of JX series.
sentences.chinese: 例句我喜歡玩劍俠情緣網絡遊戲。

sentences.english: Flags were at half mast everywhere on the day of mourning for victims of Wenchuan earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 例句汶川地震哀悼日全國降半旗誌哀。

sentences.english: I cannot recall missing so many lay-ups during a game.
sentences.chinese: 例句我無法記起怎麼會投失了這麼多上籃。

sentences.english: Limin starts the youth freezing although she is only 20 years old.
sentences.chinese: 例句李敏今年才20歲，卻已經開始動容了。

sentences.english: I bought the shoe which I liked in off-season promotion.
sentences.chinese: 例句寒促時我把那雙喜歡的鞋子買回來了。

sentences.english: They thought I was an otaku and good for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 例句他們覺得我就是個御宅男，一無是處。

sentences.english: What punishment will people receive if they refuse to apply for a temporary residence permit?
sentences.chinese: 例句拒不辦暫住證將受到哪些處罰？

sentences.english: The store sells his-and-hers clothing, so it's convenient for shopping.
sentences.chinese: 例句這家商店銷售情侶裝，購物很方便。

sentences.english: Article 77 A contract may be amended if the parties have so agreed.
sentences.chinese: 例句第七十七條當事人協商一致，可以變更合同。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
the meaning of sth/an explanation of the meaning of words or phrases/definition/an interpretation (of doctrine)/religious doctrine
